holidays.title: World Migratory Bird Day
holidays.description: Time to un-ruffle your feathers, because it's World Migratory Bird Day!

holidays.title: Archery Day
holidays.description: Draw your bows and prepare to celebrate the most iconic weapon of the ancient era.

holidays.title: Birth Mother’s Day
holidays.description: Even if Hallmark does not traditionally acknowledge this special group of women, we certainly do!

holidays.title: Brunch for Lunch Day
holidays.description: Today on Brunch for Lunch day, take a break and go brunching with your friends.

holidays.title: Cornelia De Lange Syndrome Awareness Day
holidays.description: We get to help create awareness about this rare but very real condition.

holidays.title: Dog Mom Day
holidays.description: Get ready to celebrate being a mom to your cute pups this Dog Mom Day.

holidays.title: International Day of Argania
holidays.description: Get ready to celebrate argan trees on the International Day of Argania with us!

holidays.title: Martin Z. Mollusk Day
holidays.description: Help Martin Z. Mollusk bring us an early summer by celebrating his day!

holidays.title: Micronesia Constitution Day
holidays.description: We’re journeying to Micronesia to celebrate their Constitution Day. Join us right here, right now!

holidays.title: Mother Ocean Day
holidays.description: Prepare to surf as we celebrate one of the most important aspects of life on Earth.

holidays.title: Mother's Day Mexico
holidays.description: Celebrate with us the unquestionable love of all mothers on this special day.

holidays.title: National Babysitter Day
holidays.description: Celebrate the ones who look after those dearest to you — your children.

holidays.title: National Clean Your Room Day
holidays.description: We can all admit our rooms can get chaotic from time to time.

holidays.title: National Golf Day
holidays.description: Ready? Let’s lace up, grab those golf clubs, and perfect those swings today!

holidays.title: National Lipid Day
holidays.description: Here’s how you can make a difference in the lives of people with dyslipidemia.

holidays.title: National Mini Golf Day
holidays.description: Get your putter and golf balls ready as we celebrate the fascinating game of mini-golf.

holidays.title: National Ship Via Rail Day
holidays.description: You’ll want to catch this train to learn more about the history of shipping.

holidays.title: National Small Business Day
holidays.description: Ready to seize the day? Read on to be inspired by small business owners' achievements.

holidays.title: National Train Day
holidays.description: Trains, which are always fascinating, are now one of the most eco-friendly modes of transport.

holidays.title: National Washington Day
holidays.description: Raise your glasses, it's time to toast the lush bountifulness of the Evergreen State.

holidays.title: National Windmill Day
holidays.description: Let's learn the origins of windmills and their role in shaping industries.

holidays.title: O. Henry Pun-off Day
holidays.description: Puns, wordplay, and wit — the perfect combination in O. Henry’s literary works!

holidays.title: One Day Without Shoes
holidays.description: Take off your shoes, go about your day, and raise awareness about the holiday.

holidays.title: Stamp Out Hunger Food Drive Day
holidays.description: Learn about poverty and how you can get involved in feeding the hungry.

holidays.title: Stay Up All Night Day
holidays.description: Stay up doing fun activities to celebrate Stay Up All Night Day in style.

holidays.title: Trust Your Intuition Day
holidays.description: Channel your inner superhero as we apply the power of intuition for good.

holidays.title: World Belly Dance Day
holidays.description: Explore the origins, evolution, and how best to enjoy belly dancing for fun exercise.

holidays.title: World Buckfast Day
holidays.description: Do not miss out on celebrating this fantastic day, but be ready to get a hangover!

holidays.title: World Fair Trade Day
holidays.description: The Fair Trade movement ensures fair working conditions and decent wages for workers.

holidays.title: World Lupus Day
holidays.description: Spread the news and join the fight against lupus as we mark World Lupus Day.

holidays.title: Bono’s Birthday
holidays.description: A passionate singer, songwriter, and humanitarian, he’s made an impact in more ways than one.

holidays.title: Corey La Barrie’s Birthday
holidays.description: From creating videos for fun to becoming a well-known YouTuber, his entertaining videos live on.
